column4: hello guys .. I have a problem that has not much to do with ubuntu and linux in general ... but I need help ... I have a NTS windows xp partition that I need to back up ... I cant access to windows anymore, but I am able to mount the NTFS partition with the ubuntu live cd... the problem is that when I try to copy any files that are in the users it doesnt let me copy any of them .. I just get an error message which say that I dont have the read permission
